ISSUE.TITLE: GDPR: User change history
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 In tmotions GDPR plugin there was a "profile change history" as shown in the screenshot below ![userchangehistory](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45394136/49086172-282ccf00-f254-11e8-898d-b33efc45a3a1.PNG) Please provide an automated feature in order for us to give clients information on changes they made to their profile. Ideally these changes are in the existing "GDPR requests (log)". The changes should also be included in the GDPR-export in the users profile in administration. This request is based on [Article 19 GDPR](https://gdpr-info.eu/art-19-gdpr/).
